question: So, I'm due August 17, however, I have chronic hypertension.  I'm on meds for it, but now that I'm getting so close, the meds don't seem to be responding.  My BP has been hovering just above the normal range.  I go twice a week for Non-stress tests and the baby is always fine and doing great, she's moving like crazy too.  I was just curious if anyone else is dealing with BP issues.  Doc said if mine continues,  he's inducing at 37-38 weeks for it will develop into preeclampsia.  I'm hoping for at least 38 weeks.
title: Blood Pressure Issues?
